Protocols¶

Overview¶

This module provides the ControllerProtocol, DynamicsProtocol classes for protocols functionality.

Examples¶

>>> from src.core.protocols import *

API Summary¶

src.core.protocols

Detailed API¶

class src.core.protocols.ControllerProtocol(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: Protocol

validate_gains(gains_b)[source]¶

Optional fast, vectorized validity check for controller gain sets. Returns a boolean mask of shape (B,) where True means the corresponding particle’s gains are valid and should be simulated. Implementations should be pure and inexpensive (no simulation).

Parameters:

gains_b (ndarray)

Return type:

ndarray

compute_control(state, state_vars=None, history=None)[source]¶

Compute control action given current state.

Parameters:

  • state (ndarray)

  • state_vars (Any | None)

  • history (Dict[str, Any] | None)

Return type:

float | Tuple[float, Any, Dict[str, Any]] | Tuple[float, Any, Dict[str, Any], Any]

initialize_state()[source]¶

Initialize internal state variables.

Return type:

Any

initialize_history()[source]¶

Initialize history tracking.

Return type:

Dict[str, Any]
